text: Servite College is a high school in Perth, Western Australia. It is in the suburb of Tuart Hill. The school is Roman Catholic and teaches both boys and girls. == History == Members of the Servite Order came to Australia in late 1951 and by 1958 had established St. Philipâ€™s Regional High School for Boys in Tuart Hill. In 1968, the name was changed to Servite College. In 1973, it became the first co-educational Catholic secondary school in Western Australia. == References == Category:Schools in Australia Category:Perth, Western Australia Category:1958 establishments in Australia
title: Servite College
